name: Rex: Another Island
description: An open world adventure inspired by the classics. Get lost in a wide world of precarious platforming that will take you back to a simpler time...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 Ghz CPU Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: N/A Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: 1.5 Ghz CPU Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: N/A Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
